summary: Nandini has to choose between Sameer, the man who taught her to fall in love; and Vanraj, the man from whom she learnt how to abide and fulfill promises of love.
cast: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan|Salman Khan|Ajay Devgn|Zohra Sehgal|Vikram Gokhale|Smita Jaykar|Rekha Rao|Rajeev Verma|Kenneth Desai|Ghanshyam Nayak|Vinay Pathak|Sheeba Chaddha|Meenakshi Verma|Preeti Koppikar|Divya Jagdale|Kannu Gill|Ehsan Khan|Atul Kumar Mittal|Paresh Mokashi|Jameel Khan|Dimple Inamdar|Canny Singh|Archana Gokhale|Harry Paintal|Akash Karnataki|Amrik Gill|Milind Ukey|Helen|István Wohlmuth|Balázs Görgényl|István Fekete|János Szentrimai|Magda Scheer|Péter Pálfai|Csilla Szabó|János Perjés|Coralie Roy
title: Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam
